name: Nightmares (itch) (fsnisman)
description:
Nightmares is a third-person game developed for 2022 Epic MegaJam. The theme of the jam: "As above, so below." 

In this game you play a boy who is afraid of night thunderstorms. To calm himself down, he turns on a music box that affects the events in his dream. This describes the boy's inner fear, which comes from the outside.

Team:  fs.86

Platform: Windows.

Controls:

Movement - WASD keys;

Attack  - Left Mouse Button;

Interact - E key;

Pause Menu - ESC key.

List any content that was created before the jam:

Music / Sound - weloveindies.com, zvukipro.com.

Room assets - sketchfab.com (Floor, Window, Wall, TV,   MusicBox, Wardrobe, Wardrobe, Bed, Wooden, Farm Painting, Cup, Lamp, Desk, Assets)

Mixamo characters - mixamo.com
